title: Leftwards Pushing Hand
description:
A profile of an open hand pushing or positioned with the palm toward the left. 

May be used to show a hand pushing something away or to represent rejection of something in general. May also be used with with ðŸ«¸ Rightwards Pushing Hand to show hands high fiving or holding, pressing, or squishing something.
apple_vendor_description: The leftwards pushing hand emoji on Apple devices is depicted with a distinct sense of forward momentum and polite deflection. Its smooth, rounded fingers and palm are rendered with Apple's characteristic realistic lighting, giving it a subtle 3D depth and a confident, yet gentle, push. This emoji effectively communicates 'no,' 'stop,' 'go away,' or a gentle redirection, all with the approachable and professional aesthetic of Apple's emoji design.
